document_data.mainbody:
ord Dheolur was the head of the Dheolur noble house of Cormyr in the 5 century DR.
He married Threena Cormaeril. His sister was Pella Dheolur.
He wore a suit of black chased and fluted plate armor with a helm, from Chondath, and bore a long slightly curved blade.
In the , Dheolur was killed by King Duar Obarskyr after his house had defected against Cormyr to side with Magrath the Minotaur. Duar severed Dheolurs head from his body with the sword Orbyn.
